title: REQUEST for Vocal Option in the setting !!
body:
Since changing or modding using third party software is prohibited. Is there any way I could change my game vocal into korea / japan (anime{{item:3681}}  lover) in game ?

what I mean is like some RPG game which you could play the game in English language but the vocal in Japanese etc..

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  RITO PLS~

replies.body: Sadly, Korean and Japanese aren't [**available options for the NA server**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594). To my knowledge, the only servers with those options are KR and JP.
